---

_The Rakshasa_ represents domination of others to support your own schemes. When you invest _The Rakshasa_, identify a single willing creature within 30 feet as your pledged follower. If you're at least 15th level, you can have up to two pledged followers at once. At 18th level, you can have up to three pledged followers. If you have the maximum pledged followers active and select a new one, a previous pledged follower of your choice is no longer your pledged follower. You gain an item bonus equal to your current number of pledged followers to all [Coerce](/Actions.aspx?ID=52) attempts.
